item.title: python - how to communicate between threads using pydispatcher
item.description: The pydispatcher module makes it straight forwards to communicate between different threads in the same process in python. Why would I want to do this? I am collecting and processing sensor data from an accelerometer and want to display this real-time. The interface has some controls to save the data and to change the sampling rate of the sensor. Naturally, I want to interact with the user interface without having to wait for the sensor data to be collected and processed.
